#include <stdio.h>
#include <malloc.h>
inline int ScanFast()
{
	 int input;
	 //input=(int *)malloc(sizeof(int)*4000);
	//int negative=0;
	input=0;
	register char CurrentChar=getchar_unlocked();
	/*while((CurrentChar<'0' ||CurrentChar>'9')&&CurrentChar!='-')
	{
		CurrentChar=getchar_unlocked();
		if(CurrentChar=='-')
		{
			//negative=1;
			CurrentChar=getchar_unlocked();
		}
	} */

	while(CurrentChar>='0'&&CurrentChar<='9')
	{
 		(input)=(input)*10+CurrentChar-'0';
		CurrentChar=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	/*if(negative)
		*input=-(*input);*/
	return input;
}
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int t,a,b,i,j,ar[5000],q,dk[12][5000];
	int dig_cnt,k,carry,sum;
	//scanf("%d",&t);
	for(i=0;i<=9;i++)
		dk[i][0]=1;
	for(i=0;i<=4000;i++)
		dk[1][i]=1;
	for(i=2;i<=9;i++)
	{
		dk[i][1]=i;
		ar[0]=i;
		dig_cnt=1;

		for(j=2;j<=4000;j++)
		{
			carry=0;sum=0;
			for(k=0;k<dig_cnt;k++)
			{
				ar[k]=ar[k]*i+carry;
				carry=ar[k]/10;
				ar[k]=ar[k]%10;
				sum+=ar[k];
			}
			while(carry)
			{
				ar[dig_cnt]=carry%10;
				carry/=10;
				sum+=ar[dig_cnt];
				dig_cnt++;
			}
			
			dk[i][j]=sum;
		}

	}
	t=ScanFast();
	for(q=1;q<=t;q++)
	{
		//scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
		 a=ScanFast();
         	 b=ScanFast();
		 printf("Case %d: %d\n",q,dk[a][b]);
	}
	return 0;
}
